issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
No logs appears in studio console after the application gets installed on device.

To reproduce install KS on device and navigate the app.
No logs appears.

Note: On previous sdk build: 3.3.0.v20140619164112 logs appears on studio for both ios and android
fields.summary: No logs appear in studio console after the app gets installed on device
fields.environment:
Appcelerator-Studio:3.3.0.201406171619
Sdk:3.3.0.v20140620194913
acs:1.0.14
alloy:1.4.0-rc2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.3.0-rc2
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
xcode:5.1.1
OS:Maverick(10.9.3)
Device:Nexus5(v4.4.3),iPhone5(v7.1.1)

comments.body:
I have confirmed that this issue is reproducible with the latest TItanium SDK 3.3.0.v20140624130120

The application logs are not available when a mobile app is run on iOS device. However, the application logs are available with the SDK 3.3.0.v20140617161713

node-appc: https://github.com/appcelerator/node-appc/commit/4c03f9f98bd8d7b77afbabc2cd47caa5af4285ed

Titanium CLI master pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium/pull/144
Titanium CLI 3_3_X pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium/pull/145

Getting the logs after app installed on device for both iOS and Android.
Working as expected.
Hence Closing the issue.

Appcelerator-Studio:3.3.0.201406231625
Sdk:3.3.0.v20140624142513
acs:1.0.14
alloy:1.4.0-rc2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.3.0-rc3
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
xcode:5.1.1
OS:Maverick(10.9.3)
Device:Nexus5(v4.4.3),iPHONE 5S(V7.1.1)
